General.Name: Anhui Provincial Architectural Design and Research Institute Co.Ltd.
General.Description: Anhui Provincial Architectural Design and Research Institute Co.,Ltd. provides design services. It offers architectural, urban and rural planning, landscape gardening, decoration, and municipal public design services, as well as engineering inspection services. The company was founded in 1955 and is based in Hefei, China.

2.Name: Fahua  Wei
2.Title: Deputy Gen. Mang., Director and Board Sec.
